website_summaries.verdict: Despite some stability issues, this option offers a lot of quality and features for the price.
pros: Inexpensive and comes in a choice of black or white
Features a highly adjustable neck and head
cons: Lamp can tip easily if the neck is stretched out too far
Some note problems with flickering or other quality issues after several months

customer_reviews.title: Light It Up
customer_reviews.text: I love the features of this $24 desk lamp. I saw a lot of similar lamps for MUCH more and was glad that it turned out to be so nice! You get what you pay for, etc. I have the lamp top(?) twisted off the vertical, so it shines on the whole desk, because I had to keep it on the side of the desk. It is very maneuverable, and that's one of the reasons I bought it. If I use FaceTime at night, I'll just raise it up a bit and there's plenty of light to see me clearly. I would highly recommend this over similar products with the higher price tags!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor! (You get what you pay for)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp based on the good reviews and the affordable price, but, even though it gave me about 9 months of use, the hinge in the arm started loosening and could no longer keep the lamp up without support. Soon after that it just stopped working. I may have been unlucky here, considering the good reviews, but I'll be looking for a different brand of desk lamp now, even if I have to pay more for it.
customer_reviews.author: robbongio

customer_reviews.title: For Only 8 Watts, It's Just As Bright As 60 Watts
customer_reviews.text: I had bought it for my mom at age; 91 with poor eyes sight. With full brightness; she able to read so tiny prints on her's pills. The power supply were putting out 11.8 volt. Lithium-Ion 3 cells in series is just about 11.8 volt is perfect. Because the cord is a tripping hazard from living room table to wall plug/outlet. So I had rigged up battery for several hours of use on single charge. She is so happy with not so expensive lamp. Regular power supply isn't recommend because of 13.8 to 15 volts instead of just on border-line 12 volt. Lithium-Ion 12 volt battery is the safest way to go as the power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: some nice pluses but one of 3 failed in a year. - updated 3 of 3 failed in 15 months.  Junk
customer_reviews.text: nice sleek design, very small footprint and nice features. bought 3 for the guest quarters about a year ago and recently one stopped working. not a bulb issue but a power issue. have been used maybe 10x in the year. aside from that they seem like a good lamp. would be nice to hear from the manufacturer/supplier on the matter. so a follow up. two of 3 failed within 18 months. downgrade to a 1 star. only redeeming feature is the slick design. second one had a switch failure wtih a default to the always on mode. one additional follow up. 3 of 3 failed within 15 months. never heard from supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Nice light. Like the adjustable intensity
customer_reviews.text: Nice light. Like the adjustable intensity. Easy to change light setting.G ood light even at lower settings. Well balanced so it doesn't fall over. Extremely adjustable for any type of work. I use primarily for office desk but also for reading. I would have liked it better if the height could be extended a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Best light for your eyes
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I get migraines and have one at work so that I don't have to use the florescent ceiling light. I love the brightness adjustment. Due to covid Im working from home more so I bought another one for my office. I could not get/find the same exact model as before 😒 (that one also had color tone adjustment), but this is very similar. Just no color tone adjustment, but still has the brightness adjustment. It works great and helps my eyes so I don't get as many headaches. I'm super happy and might get another one for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slim, attractive, adjustable, foldable LED lamp with dimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive LED dimmable lamp. Offers "brite white" light that is dimmable to a soft glow via 5 increments. No heat generated even at brightest setting. Tall enough to have the light shining down onto copy that is on a copy stand. Light can be angled as needed to avoid glare on bright white paper. Lamp folds flat when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good, flicker-free, soft light. 200 - 500 lumens.
customer_reviews.text: Good, flicker-free, soft light. Large weighted base keeps it stable (the base is a bit larger than I thought it would be). I like the minimalist look of it and I can also see some of these being good for general workbench use.. User-controlled variable illumination.;provides 200 - 500 lumens (based on manufacturer's data). The memory function is good to have. There are other similar-looking lamps, but this has a lower power consumption than the other models I saw.
customer_reviews.author: THA D IN A-TOWN

customer_reviews.title: Great in the TV Room & in the Craft Room
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered 2 LE Dimmable LED Desk Lamps. One for his end table in the TV room and one for my table in the Craft room. I love my lamp! I can adjust the brightness easily, the light is not glaring and I can move it any direction to better see what I am working on. When I finish my work I turn it off and fold the light down so that it is out of the way. My husband loves his lamp because it doesn't glair in his face while he is working on the computer or watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie K

customer_reviews.title: Power ON red light not working - the ON button is very hard to find when the room is dark.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this light (my 2nd one) new on Sept. 29, 2018 and the RED indicator around the Power On button never worked. At first I thought I would just let it go, but I soon became annoyed when I found it harder and harder to find the button in the dark, to turn it on. The first light I purchased came with the RED indicator and it still works on that light since purchasing it on Oct. 14, 2015. Both lights were purchased from Lighting Ever and were sold by Neon Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Lou in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Starting to die after 3 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June of 2016 and it's served me well for those 3+ years, but has now started to flicker when I turn it on. Based on a few other reviews that describe the same thing, this is likely the start of it's demise. other reviews describing the same thing:   For an LED light that should last 10's of thousands of hours, this is a pretty poor showing for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 19 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 19 months, then quit. Appears to be issue on connection between plug and socket into lamp. Good options for dimming, used next to computer so could set with minimal light so as not to interfere with screen, or bright light for other uses. Reasonably small footprint, and position easily adjustable. Just expect it to last more than 19 months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barnett

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is dimmable although I typically keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk at work. I needed a bright light that wouldn't take up too much space. This lamp fit the bill perfectly. I love that it is dimmable although I typically keep it on the brightest setting. It also bends and rotates making it easy to put the light just where you need it. I'm going to be buying another one for my home office. My business partner liked mine so much, he bought one for himself.
customer_reviews.author: JulieÃÂ W.

customer_reviews.title: great desktop or nightstand utility light, but needs a mechanical on=off switch
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't take up much space, and is omni directional. There are different shades/qualities of light from bright white, to paper yellow. What I don't like is the lack of a mechanical on-off switch. All the controls are touch sensitive, and flush with the lamp's base. So at night it is difficult finding exactly the right spot to touch to turn the lamp off .....
customer_reviews.author: laptopfan

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is awesome and a great value
customer_reviews.text: I buy 100's of items every year from amazon and write almost no reviews but this is probably the most pleasant surprise I've had in months. This lamp is really cool and versatile and offers a longer dimmable light that will meet whatever need you have. I bought this mainly on price and I have purchased 3 other led desk lights and none of them are anywhere close to the quality and versatility this one offers. 5 of 5 and I would easily buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer/Reporter

customer_reviews.title: Great Light!
customer_reviews.text: I spend weeks, sometimes months, in hotel rooms. I seldom have work close to home. Writing reports in hotel rooms is challenging, even the ones with a "work station" in the room seldom have adequate lighting. This desk lamp is about as perfect for me as it can get. Excellent light source light weight, very positionable and folds down to very flat and small when I have to load up and head for the next job. The ability to lower the intensity of the light meant nothing to me when I bought this, but is now a feature I use often.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D

customer_reviews.title: This is a great light.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself months ago and I love it so much. I bought a second one recently for someone who has poor eye sight. They have told me so many times how much this has helped them see things they couldn't see since there eyesight has become increasingly worse. This light has given that person a bit of independence....THANK YOU FOR THIS WONDERFUL LIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have a piece of artwork above the desk I use for my adult coloring books. I prefer the coloring books with intricate designs. This means I need lots of light. I had been unable to find a lamp that didn't both provide enough light, and didn't block my view of the artwork when I wasn't sitting at the desk. This solves the problems. It is very bright. When folded it is only a hair over 2 inches high. I can see as well as can be when I need it, and it tucks out of the way when I don't. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bee 1321

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, love it and would purchase again!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp on my nail station and I Love it! The brightness is great and I like that it has multiple brightness settings. It is sleek and can be iced around to light up specific areas which is a plus! You can fold the lamp down and makes for a very clean appearance!! It is touch so you don’t have to worry about twisting knobs. This was a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Stickles

customer_reviews.title: because I liked the lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp back in April 2016. Today it died. The red on/off power light just flashes. If I try to turn it on, the lights will flash on for 1/2 second and turn off. Shame, because I liked the lamp. UPDATE: After reading what happened, the company itself reached out to me to correct my issue. That means they stand behind their product 100%. I can now fully recommend this lamp and the company that creates it with full confidence knowing that if it fails before it's actual life time, they will replace the product. You can not ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: improved quality over the previous model
customer_reviews.text: 2nda review: after receiving a new updated model, I can say they heard the feedback from customers. The quality and feeling of handling the lamp is much better now. It also has a panel of options to easily set the situation of use: sleep, reading, max light, etc. Yet, the joints have to be improved as they easily get loose. /// 1st review: it works, and looks nice. The feeling is cheap and fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Stable, Adjustable & BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp is sleekly designed, adjustable angles, brightness is stunning and dimmer is very easy to use. I use for lighting my artwork area and the light allows for me to see the shades of colors with stunning clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for studying!!
customer_reviews.text: My window in my room is on the opposite side of where my desk is. This makes it hard to study at my desk since the lighting isn't very good. This lamp is the perfect solution! The light is very bright on the highest setting, and looks like natural day light. I love that I can bend it which ever way I want and that I can twist the LED head. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good but design improvement needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp for my jigsaw puzzle hobby or doing any detail work. However the on off and brightness mechanism is on the surface of the base. The slightest touch turns it off or decreases the brightness. I would've given this 5 stars if it was placed on the side instead. While doing puzzles and reaching across I'm constantly, inadvertently turning off the map.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting, and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these now. I bought one and loved it, bought another. I had to buy a third because my wife kept stealing one of them because she liked it for doing her crafts. The lighting is really nice and clear, it’s adjustable for your tasks, a very well rounded multi function light! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Less than one Star
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light and super adjustable. UPDATE: I bought 2 of these as a gift for my wife in Feb 2016. She bought one for our Grandson less than 2 years ago. ALL 3 of them no longer work. Each one started flickering a little over a year after we purchased them (and golly gee, the warranty had just ran out). The flickering increased in intensity and would never stop until finally the lights would no longer work. I have a different LED desk lamp that is over 6 years old and still works perfectly. This lamp is NOT worth the money. We will never buy another one like these nor buy from the sellers ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Every Desk Should Have One Of These
customer_reviews.text: I do not impress easily, but THIS lamp IS impressive. Not only does it work exceptionally well, it is designed perfectly. It requires very little room on the desk and is intuitive to operate. Light brightness and ability to avoid glare are fully adjustable. This product has my highest personal recommendation - a TRUE 5-Star!!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Organizer

customer_reviews.title: See the light...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lamp....I just love it. The touch sensitive dimming/brightening feature is awesome. The LED lighting is not as warm and soft as INCANDESCENT, but it does grow on you. I like the lowest intensity setting for relaxing, and the highest setting is more than than adequate for reading. Stylish and compact, with virtually infinite positioning adjustments. No assembly required. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: childofthe60s

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Using this for hobbies requiring the ability to see colors as they actually are. This is perfect for what I'm doing. I can see all the hues of a color and match up colors very nicely. So, if you are painting, making jewellery, sewing, anything that requires scrutiny of colors, this light will work nice. I did also add some sunlight light bulbs in my ceiling fan in the room, to make it that much brighter, but this is perfect for really "zeroing" in on your project. It won't light up an entire room, just about a table's worth of space.
customer_reviews.author: gothyballerina

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS - GETS OVERLY HOT TO TOUCH - FIRE HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: This light gets EXTREMELY HOT. Since it's a desk lamp it should be able to stay on all day. However, after about 6 hours today it is untouchable. More than 5 seconds and I would burn my hand badly enough to need medical attention. I will return it in a few days once it's cool enough to wrap back up. LEDs should never get hot enough to notice. Probably some cheap components or not truly LED. This light will eventually start a fire.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the adjustable brightness and the touch controls make it feel higher end. I do wish there was a slight bump or a change in texture so you could feel the on/off and the slider bar so it can quickly be located in the dark. It tilts and turns in all sorts of useful directions. However, I did notice that when it is turned on the base, at a certain degree, it will tip very easily. Still, I love it and use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: FIRST AND LAST LAMP I'LL BUY (100%)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product due to my schoolwork and I would recommend anyone who studies or reads a lot to get one. This has been amazing. I love the simplistic look and features. It's very responsive to the touch and quickly switches to the wanted level of brightness! The wire is the perfect length! I can twist the light and the holder/stand which makes it very flexible yet due to its quality you can feel it's sturdiness! I really like this product. It arrived extremely fast too which is a plus. I'm sorry I sound a bit too excited but I'm just very happy with everything! Thanks for this product~
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desk Lamp- Exactly As Described!
customer_reviews.text: We love this desk lamp! It provides plenty of light to keep the corner lit, but not disturb nappers or movie watchers in the other corner. The dimming feature is great/works perfectly, and the sleek body of the lamp provides a beautiful, eclectic style while not crowding the desk (the stacks of papers do that well enough!). It's great to provide a little extra light during daylight hours, and have even used it to play board games at night or fix small mechanical parts under the super bright light. The girls even use it for their makeup! Our family is very pleased with this lamp, and would certainly consider buying another if the need arose in another room. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Polli

customer_reviews.title: Love the flexibility of the lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I needed some thing flexible on my desk, because I do a lot of zoom calls, and getting ready to do more videos, and have had a tough time getting the lighting right. I have had this for about 2 weeks, and this little lamp is great! I can rotate the "stem" of the light, I can turn the "head" of the light pointing at my desk, or pointing up, or anything in between. It dims... and the price is great! I really appreicate that the on/off and dimmer are on the base - easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Forster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brightness, a tiny lack of stability when fully extended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brightness, perfect and fast touch surface to switch from low dim to a full bright. A tiny lack of stability when fully extended, solved with a double side tape - just in case. Arrived very well packed and fully assembled with "Same Day Delivery". Just plug and light up !
customer_reviews.author: Laurent :.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing design and quality. Many ways to shift its angle.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this. I've had it for more than half a year, and I am loving it even more. I always look up other people's desks on Instagram, but I have never seen one that is prettier than this one. The design is so delicate and love how I can do so much with the angle and the brightness. I thought I would be a little disappointed for buying a stand that doesn't have yellow brightness but never actually felt the need to get yellowness when I'm studying. If you do need it, just get some fairy lights.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia Yun

customer_reviews.title: More expensive, more cheaper made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp two years ago. I needed another lamp for home office, so Since I was ok with what I bought, I would buy the same to match the one I have. However, when I set it up, it does not have the red AC indicator that the previous one does. So I paid $6.00 more for the same lamp that does not have at least the same features as the cheaper. The manual say “ red indicator will turn on when there is AC to the lamp”. No red indicator available to this lamp. Yes, the lamp lights, but the missing indicator does not because it is missing.
customer_reviews.author: John Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect for my hobby desk. I use it to illuminate my desk while working on models and painting. The arm swivel on 4 separate axis’s and the dimmer feature lets you adjust the light to your liking. I’ve had it on max brightness for over an hour, fairly close to my head and mine has never gotten hot. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J-Mo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect on a desk, end table, or night stand. The light is adjustable in direction and brightness. The arm is flexible and will stay put in most positions while the lamp will also rotate in all directions. The touch power button and brightness settings make this light very easy to use. It also an attractive looking light. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jpz

customer_reviews.title: No USB, but otherwise a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my crafting table. Great range of brightness and the swivel arm is wonderful. It does NOT have a USB option to plug into your computer so you must find a wall outlet. I knew this upon purchase but that point is still a downside. It does fold up nicely for storage on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for counted cross stitching and for my coloring books, both of which require superior lighting since the right colors are so important for my projects. This lamp was the perfect purchase for my needs. The price was quite affordable for the quality and I love the sleek style. Takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: <NightOwlGal>

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amazing lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm blown away by how great this lamp is! I design jewelry so I got it for my design area cuz I need good light. This lamp is amazing. Tiny footprint and the amount of light it gives is outstanding. I absolutely love the fact that you just run your hand along the base left and right and you can dim it. It rotates all over the place so that you can actually move the head where the lamp is to wherever you need it to be and then when you're not using it you can completely fold the entire thing down. Sleek! I just bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Just a touch with your finger this lamp provides the right amount of task light. It could not be any easier with seven dimming levels. With it's sleek modern style, the lamp is not to big or to small for a desk. It can rotate to many different positions with ease, which comes in handy if you need the light to be a little closer to your task.The only negative, when you want to swivel the light right or left, you have to hold down the base because it moves, maybe because the lamp is not heavy. The quality seems to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Dertbena

customer_reviews.title: Great design, Projects a lot of light
customer_reviews.text: Everyone asks where I got this desk lamp. The design is very modern, and I love the slim profile. While it's still going strong, I wish I had known that you can't change the bulb. It's all one piece, so eventually it will be disposable, which is not cool. That would have affected my decision to buy. In the meantime, however, I am really enjoying how much light it's able to produce and how it's keeping my plants alive when I am far, far away from any windows.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this lamp to all computer users and avid readers
customer_reviews.text: Just received this lamp and am now using it. It is exactly as described and the ability to increase or decrease the brightness is wonderful. The adjustability of the lamp from the base to the light arm is perfect for different needs. I am truly sorry that LE doesn't carry floor lamps, I would buy several, in a flash! I am, however, thinking of rearranging my side table at my reading chair to accommodate another of LE Dimmable LED Desk Lamp and getting rid of the lamp now in use.
customer_reviews.author: AliceKZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: There is much competition for this type of table lamp. For our main application we couldn’t have asked for more. We bought 2 of them for working jigsaw puzzles. They can easily adjust positions to be out of the way while still providing more than adequate lighting. The thing we like the best is the lack of glare. There is still mild glare, but we are very pleased with the lamps.
customer_reviews.author: 4-G-S

customer_reviews.title: easy touch & simple swivel
customer_reviews.text: Simple to swivel around and up. Light is gentle touch on, like a touch screen device, and same with the dimmer/brightness control. perfect for my special needs' person who will be using it. Only negative not super heavy base so may have to 'tie' down.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyGal07

customer_reviews.title: It is a very sophisticated design and looks really good but upon arrival adapter is dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: It is a very sophisticated design and looks really good but upon arrival adapter is dead on arrival. I figured it was the adapter after finding another adapter with similar specs and tried the lamp and it work. Very pretty. I would not want to return the lamp if company can furnish me a new working adapter, asap. My rating will change to 5 star if problem can be resolved promptly. I hope they can improve their adapter. Update: I received a respond from the seller and updating my review to 5 star. I just love the design of the lamp like had said. I'm using it now with a different adapter.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: This is a super great product for what you are paying
customer_reviews.text: This is a super great product for what you are paying. A couple of things though: the LED strip is either broken on mine or it just doesn't span the length of the light. It still puts out a lot of light, but I don't understand having the bar go out that far and take up more space if only part of it is lit. My other issue is that its LED but the light gets pretty hot, which I don't find with most LED fixtures. All in all, you get a good product, especially at this price. Definitely a desk light, don't expect the light to flood a whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one star
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and great value. This is an update to my initial review. Although I really liked the lamp, it has already quit working after 14 months. The lamp was not used very much because I only use it to see my computer keyboard and I'm not on my computer for long periods of time. I would not recommend it and I'm changing my score to one star,
customer_reviews.author: JOHN C. CALLISON

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the reliability of the lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The light was bright enough for the workspace but the arm drifted when I would get it into place. It needed to be frequently adjusted. I got about 30 hours out of the light until it failed completely and will no longer turn on. I was hoping it would last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: nateprokrasti

customer_reviews.title: OK but HOT
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. I like the dimming feature. I also like all the angles it can bend at. At some angles it loses the ability to hold itself up. The top piece where the light is gets REALLY hot. Like burn your hand, fire hazard hot. I'd give more stars if I didn't worry about it burning my office down. Update: seller offered me a partial refund because of my dissatisfaction. I'll up my rating for great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Best desk lamp ever
customer_reviews.text: Best desk lamp ever!!! The light is a bit bright since it's white LED and not yellow. However, the low setting works fine. It only hurts if you're exhausted and in need of rest. The only thing that bothers me is that the touch is really sensitive and if water gets on it it'll change the setting. Also the whole bar isn't white which i wish it was. Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice design for your computer desk, but a throw-away when it fails, which it will
customer_reviews.text: This fit my need particular need perfectly. I have extended the light low over my computer keyboard, which it illuminates nicely without obstructing the view of my slightly-elevated monitors. Its intensity range is fine for my purpose. I docked a star because the base is so light that it will not balance the lighting element if it is fully extended to either side -- but the base is big enough to support a somewhat-dense counterweight. Added Sep 2020: Light now flashes brightly and continuously, so is of no further use. Spoke drectly to LG; they are willing to refund or replace during warrenty period, but not now. Four stars for performance, none for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: John Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Desk Lamp we have found. It is light, but heavy to withstand the cats laying on it and they don't push it off the desk. The brightness is awesome and really generates allot of light. We would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sigmond

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little lamp and generates really good light output for it's sleek and slender design. The touch controls feel very responsive and modern. There's 5 or so different light settings that either brighten or dim the light. A drawback from mine I noticed is that if kept on the highest setting for a long period of time, the bulb starts to get really hot. I wouldn't recommend keeping it at its brightest because even the mid to lower settings is plenty bright for reading. Overall it's a great lamp that's low maintenance and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect functional lamp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one a while back, use it as a side lamp during medical treatments. It is perfect. Bright when needed, just a little glow when less light is needed. The best part is the flexibility, angling the arm and the light itself in almost limitless positions. I can get the light exactly where I need it. So, I just purchased another one for my desk. It is still perfect, and looks pretty great too. I highly recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Peplinski

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my wife and me for our living room table. Just angled them for each side of the table. Works great for reading, etc. I was impressed by the many adjustable rotations and angles for the light to be positioned how you like it. Light intensity adjustments are very cool! Touch control is really nice! They are sturdy and well made. It would be cool if you could change colors also. The color or colors could be on the other side of the rotatable light bar at top. Can I say any more? Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Grubb

customer_reviews.title: Gets abnormally hot on the highest setting.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is excellent. Good build quality, firm joints so its easy to move but also stays put. Touch controls work great. There isn't a huge contrast between dim setting, though. And the highest brightness level, I don't ever use because the lamp gets too hot to touch literally within one minute of turning it on. The second highest brightness setting does not noticeably get hot, though. Even after extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and set it up. It is exactly what I was looking for. Working from home this lamp just fits my needs. Try it out-it's an LED lamp and hardly generates any heat, has several brightness settings, and is only 8W of power. NICE!
customer_reviews.author: T.L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint lamp great for cramped spaces.
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this in his college quarters, where he has only a small desk. The lamp base has a small footprint so it doesn't interfere with his workspace, but also extends over a bit and has an adjusting range on the lighting portion that allows him to cast lighting to further reaches as needed. The LED's provide great lighting, but the dimming levels also allow him to broaden its use. He can set it on a dim lighting when he's just moving about the room or when he'll be coming home to a dark room. The brighter settings are great for when he's working on projects or reading.
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: It's not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I had bought two of these in the past and was very satisfied. Those two lights had USB ports in the base to charge phones etc. Several months had past and they appeared in my "buy again". They were good lights and the USB ports were great. I bought the light again. The "light" was the same but the USB ports were not in the base. I think I was screwed. The current listing maybe not list USB charging ports in the base, but when Amazon wants you to "order again", that is deceptive. I will not order again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lowrance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lamp works really well. In fact I have no complaints about the actual lamp. I do however have a complaint about my coworker who was slowly gas lighting me with the lamp by turning it off and on when I was not paying attention. I thought for a few days that the light had a timer and could not figure out until one day I caught him giggling in a corner after it happened. So just be forewarned that the lamp does not have a timer feature and if it is doing this most likely it is one of your coworkers gas lighting you.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk light, responsive touch controls
customer_reviews.text: I love this light; I ended up buying two - one black, one white. The touch controls are very responsive, and while the top part (where the light is) can get hot, I've still be able to adjust it however I need without burning myself. The vertical piece swivels in the base, so you can either swivel the lamp or move the entire base. I did have to tighten the screw near the base on the vertical piece as I preferred that part to be more stiff, but it's a simple adjustment. I would buy this lamp again if I needed another, and I would recommend to anyone who needs an affordable LED desk light.
customer_reviews.author: K. BrackettTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: This fit the bill and I couldn't be happier with it
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for my son's desk in our kids area. I was looking for something unique and special but found all unique and special desk lamps were pricey and had less features. I ended up going the other route for something very clean and simple looking with lots of features that was well priced. This fit the bill and I couldn't be happier with it. I will be purchasing a second for my other son's desk.
customer_reviews.author: Buys Too Much

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this light! I can craft in the same room as someone else at night time and not disturb them! I use it for crafting, love that it takes up little space, is dimmable and light can be rotated. Great price for this lamp, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best table lamp ive had
customer_reviews.text: So far, the best table lamp ive had. (not that I had many to begin with), but dang this is impressive. Very versatile, especially with the different angle you can position it, and also with the different brightness settings, i only use it on the 2nd brightest settings because thats sufficient enough for me. sleek design to it as well. Id recommend. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Gk

customer_reviews.title: Would be good in a disco (for colorblind folks)
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them about 4 years ago. Worked fine until about a year ago until one of them started flickering slightly for a few minutes before emitting a steady light. Now the flickering has intensified and not shut off. I feel bad about this because the LED lights still work perfectly, just that the electronics (evidently the power supply) seems to suck. I now have to throw a perfectly good lamp into the trash simply because the manufacturer wanted to save a few cents on the electronics :( Update a few days later... The power supply blew up. I simply replaced it (with a similar power supply) and the lamp works fine
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It swivels in so many directions and works very well. I like the touch controls. I saw a review that said there are only 5 settings but there are 7 settings. The "mini suns" at either end are also brightness controls. The light is just what I needed for my desk. Lots of light without taking up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are different dimming levels
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are different dimming levels. I've been using mine for about half a year now and it's been great. Really helps light up my dark office space. The ability to adjust and rotate the light makes this all the better. You can easily move the light out of your way instead of moving your entire body.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing addition to my beauty station
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is so perfect for lighting up whatever you need to detail. I do my nails at home, and this has changed the game. I can see every little detail now. I also use this as a makeup light and its perfect. It folds all the way down and I can take it with me on photoshoots to do my makeup in a flash.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Furda

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I really like the design, brightness levels and the very flexible and adjustable arms to accommodate your reading positions. The only thing I dislike is, if you have the lamp arm extended, the base is too light to support the weight and causes the lamp to tip, so I have to add weight to the base to prevent that from happening, which is not a big issue. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, wonderful lamp! I have this in a nursery so we can adjust the light based on whether baby is sleeping or awake. The swivel head is wonderful and allows you to shine the light exactly where you need it. The bright is pretty bright. The buttons are very easy to use and sensitive to the touch, so I can easily turn on the lamp and adjust the brightness or turn off the lamp with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for desk, hobby, bedside reading and nightlight
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! The variation in brightness is excellent and the angles the two arms makes it very versatile. From my nightstand, it can reach over across my lap and allows reading while sitting up in bed. Also, I will often use it with the light folded all the way in to the support arm and the power setting on dim if I need a soft light when waking in the middle of the night for a glass of water. I have another one at my fly tying desk that provides excellent lighting.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Lights Up My Room!
customer_reviews.text: This beats an old, hot lamp that burns your hands and uses a light bulb. Take note this gets super bright and is larger than you think it is. It's my fault for not reading, but it doesn't go 360 degrees, but I will not be taking a star off for my fault. I will say this is perfect for large office desks, but if you have a short desk you will have a hard time finding a place for this.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Desk Lamp Review
customer_reviews.text: Light arrived in good time. Looks nice and seems to work fine so far. Light is bright enough on high level.The only small issue is that the adapter plug seems like it does not retain real well into the back of the light base. Can easily be dislodged and happened a couple of times as I was first positioning the light. The wire length is fine (59") coming off the 12V adapter. Leaving light base in one place seems to work fine. I would rate at least 4.5 stars and 5 if retention was improved on connector. Also my eyes could use a double strip of these lights but it is a nice light for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad P

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for close work, such as needle crafts.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cordless lamp and accidently ordered this one. As it turns out, I can use this one in a different location, so I'm keeping it because the features are great. It's super adjustable, and the touch sensitive pad is excellent, very responsive, but not overly so. The light is eye friendly and it's earth friendly as well. My fault it didn't get 5 stars, it's not cordless...my bad. If you need a corded lamp, this is terrific! Wonderful for counted cross-stitch projects.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This works so good. I use it for homework, to do my nails, pluck my eyebrows, literally everything. You can dim it and you can tilt it to go where you need it. Plus it just looks fancy and clean. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Harless Presnell

customer_reviews.title: I love lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp for my visually impaired Dad, who needed something with a dimmer because he is very sensitive to light. He really loves it, but I'm unimpressed with the brightness settings, there is very minimal difference between settings 2-6, Low is low and high is high but the middle settings are all nearly the same. That being said, the lamp is good quality and all the swivels and hinges work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacey

customer_reviews.title: Quality lamp, durable, very adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: It has several (non-continuous) brightness settings. Wish there was a setting between the brightest and second-to-brightest, as the brightest setting is just a bit too glaring when starting at sheet music. If I was using it to study, I wouldn't use the brightest setting. My three-year-old hit it with a ball while playing in the room, knocking it off the piano. It still worked fine despite the fall, even though it struck the granite window sill on the way down. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: David Eason

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very skeptical b/c it was cheaper than the others but very impressed once receiving it. First off it's super light but able to stay stable when the light is fully extended. The sleek design also makes is pleasing to the eyes. The light swivels and the base spins so you can easily adjust the angle while reading. I wish it swiveled just a little more but not a deal breaker for me. You can adjust the brightness of the daylight LED bulbs to meet your needs. That's all. It's a great reading lamp.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Strong brightness for bedside reading or desktop study. Wonderful LED lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Touch slider for brightness works great. It also has a wonderful angle adjustment to the arm. Fantastic company stands behind their product and goes above and beyond to insure customer satisfaction. I would definitely buy this lamp again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good light
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good light, it is a lot bigger than I thought it was going to be, but luckily I just built a new desk so I have a enough room. My only issue is the color temp, its around 5k which is pure white light. I thought the different light levels would change that as I went lower but it didnt. My fault for not researching it properly and trying to save a bit of money by not buying the $30 alternatives. I cant knock the lamp for that tho
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but topples on extending forward
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright and works well for writing and painting for which I bought it. 4star because if you extend it forward a bit too much it topples over. Either the range of extension should've been limited or should've had a weighted base to stop toppling. No issues with the light though.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Great white it lasted - but that wasn't long
customer_reviews.text: I really really liked this lamp. Both of them I bought are not working though after a relative short time. The first stopped working after a week or two, the other one after a couple of months. LED technology should run for extremely long times compared to incandescent lighting, so this design is definitely defective.
customer_reviews.author: Don Eisele

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far this light is great, hopefully it will last a long time. Lets see never tried the company brand, but so far so good. its bright and working so far. I got it in the mail bout a week ago. using it and it illuminates my desk area very well in the night time and day time. Try it the price is right for it. It folds flat against the stand and has a sensor to brighten and or dims, a power button flat near the dimmer and base of the lamp. all you have to do is touch the sensor to turn it on and slide your finger side to side to brighten or dim the light.
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit confused as I saw only 5 levels but the 2 suns were actually part of the levels. Even though this is a pretty good desk lamp, I noticed another desk lamp that seemed a bit more appealing for around the price range. Won’t dock off any stars for that, however.
customer_reviews.author: Glowing Kernel

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: After using just a handful of times, it stopped working completely. Really liked it at first as it has a very modern and sleek design. It would be a great product if only it would last longer. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JLGY

customer_reviews.title: G8
customer_reviews.text: I get really hot underneath this lamp. Not sure if it’s just me. It is really low so I had to put some thing underneath it so it won’t be in my way I kept hitting my head. I use this lamp for doing nails. I keep accidentally turning up and down the brightness very sensitive to touch. Great overall but too short needs about 4/5 inches on length for someone who is 5’4
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect... But large base and bright indicator light holds it back
customer_reviews.text: The lamp's light is a clean color that just works well with your eyes. Reduces eye strain. Lights only what you need lit. Referring to just the light alone, it's the perfect desk lamp. Only two things that annoy me and that is the base is larger than it needs to be. If it were made with a weight in it, it wouldn't need to be as large to prevent it from tipping over. Unnecessarily takes up desk space. Also, the red indicator light stays on when it's off, leaving a red glow in the corner of our bedroom. Not huge issues, but prevents it from being 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Alpengeist

customer_reviews.title: Dual purpose
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to read Paper books when not using my kindle, it is sleek and modern. There is a touch pad so no ugly big buttons. It will also serve a dual purpose foir my planted 2 gallon sick tank aquarium, it will help gross plants since it's 6,000 k 8 watts, no it's not water proof so it will be away from the splashing. This company really cares about their product and answered my emails in a quiuck manner. I am glad to have this back!
customer_reviews.author: Brutal Riot Girl

customer_reviews.title: they were in white and the lights were a bright white color and it was perfect for my business
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered these lights, they were in white and the lights were a bright white color and it was perfect for my business. But the white got so dirty from all the chemicals and dust so i decided to order these again in black. I was so happy when it got here but super disappointed because the light is yellow!!! The lighting is not even white. I made sure to click on the same order as before because I didn’t want to have to go through this hassle buying the wrong lights that came with a yellow hue. Overall.. price is good but disappointed because this was not the color I expected To be.
customer_reviews.author: naly xiong

customer_reviews.title: I do dislike the "touch" style controls these type of lights are ...
customer_reviews.text: It's much bigger than I thought! very bright. Do wish the dimmer would let it got a little bit darker but that's just for my use in a bedroom i use it for back lighting while watching TV. I do dislike the "touch" style controls these type of lights are all going to. this is my 5th LED dimmer light and every single one of the the touch switch went making the light basically unusable. I small mechanical dimmer switch/dial would be preferred..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great sewing or reading light
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light, very portable. I keep it in my sewing machine case for use at group quilting events. Nice full spectrum light, aims where I want it to and cool enough no worry about accidentally touching it. With no bulbs, also less concern about transporting it. I replaced a compact florescent goose neck floor lamp with this. You can imagine how much more convenient and the light is better as well!
customer_reviews.author: jessieth

customer_reviews.title: My wife has 2 sowing tables.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife because I earlier got one for my ham radio table and I really like it. My wife just got into sewing and needed more light on her sewing tables, she is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Pleased with this Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep next to my sofa for reading magazines and doing needlework. My regular table lamp just wasn't enough. Light was too high & far away. Being able to angle this Desk Lamp, where the light is right over what I'm looking at is wonderful. Love that you can adjust brightness by just a touch of a finger...low to high with 5 levels. Exactly what I was looking for. Got the idea from lights they use at my nail salon. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Deb T

customer_reviews.title: So sad it won’t stay in a forward position like it should.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp but it does it stay in a “forward” or “aft” position unless I hold it there! I wanted it the most for this particular feature. The light is super and I don’t know if another will be the same?! It is to stay in any position for or aft and it won’t! I tried to tighten the huge but it didn’t move.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Tode

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The longer I have this lamp the more I love it. Great light, wonderfully functional, and it has a stylish design. Very stable too - I don't worry about it falling over or sliding about even though I use it on a rolling desktop. Its not an issue for me, but some folks may want a longer cord. That is the only possible issue I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie noonan

customer_reviews.title: A great artists light
customer_reviews.text: I'm a terrible painter. This light is a great blue light that allows me to see my terrible paintings in a much nicer way. lol It's a great little art table light that can be twisted about to suit your needs. I really like this light. Now, if only I could paint...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: perfect lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this and its my second one already. My son took my old one and i ordered a new one for myself. its so bright and perfect when i put my make up on. it doesnt hurt your eyes on the brightest level.
customer_reviews.author: luanne

product_meta.title: LE Dimmable LED Desk Lamp,Good for Back To School - 7 Brightness Levels,Touch Dimmer, Daylight White, Eye Care Natural Light, Office Task Lamp for Reading,Study, Computer Work and More (Silver White)
feature_bullets: DIMMABLE & MEMORY FUNCTION: 7 dimming levels are controlled by a simple touch sensitive panel, which is great because you can dim the light to find the perfect brightness level for your situation, such as Reading, Studying, Relaxing and Sleeping. Also, the lamp will automatically resume the brightness setting of the previous use when restarted.

ADJUSTABLE & STURDY: With a 270 rotatable lamp head, 150 adjustable arm and 340 revolvable base, the lamp is able to reach just about almost every position you can imagine. And thanks to the built-in base stabilizer, the lamp base will stay sturdy when you adjusting its angle.

EYE-FRIENDLY: The light source of desk lamp is non-flicking LEDS and the lamp is powered by direct current and covered by opacified PC diffusion cover, so it emits even, flicker-free and non-glare light, which is soft on your eyes and avoids eye fatigue caused by flickering light and harsh glare effectively.
WELL-DESIGNED: The lamp head and lamp arm is made of high-quality aluminum, which effectively solves the heat dissipation issue, protects the LED chip and increases the LED lifespan.

WHAT WILL YOU GET: 1 pcs LE 8W Dimmable LED Desk Lamp, 1 pcs AC adapter with 4.92 ft/1.5m power cord, 1 pcs easy to read manual, our worry-free 12-month warranty and friendly, easy-to-reach customer service.

specifications.Special Features: Instant On, Shock and vibration resistant, Dimmable, Non-bug-attracting, Touch Control
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,316 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
